underlying_goal: To incorporate additional figures and textual clarifications into the workshop paper to strengthen its narrative, while respecting the page budget.
primary_success: Successfully incorporated significant new figures and textual edits into a LaTeX paper, making strategic decisions about main body vs. appendix placement to respect the page budget while strengthening the paper's core narrative.
brief_summary: Following user feedback, Claude further refined a research paper. It added new figures illustrating different sandbagging variants, strengthened the textual discussion of a key confound in a baseline method, and strategically placed new content in either the main body or appendix to stay within the 12-page limit. The final, updated paper was successfully compiled.
